info.title: Azure Log Analytics
info.description: This API exposes Azure Log Analytics query capabilities

post.description: Executes an Analytics query for data. [Here](https://dev.loganalytics.io/documentation/Using-the-API) is an example for using POST with an Analytics query.

200.description: OK. The API call succeeded and the Analytics query result is in the response payload

queryParam.name: query
queryParam.description: The Analytics query. Learn more about the [Analytics query syntax](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/app-insights-analytics-reference/)

queryBody.name: body
queryBody.description: The Analytics query. Learn more about the [Analytics query syntax](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/app-insights-analytics-reference/)

subscriptionId.name: subscriptionId
subscriptionId.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

resourceGroupName.name: resourceGroupName
resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group to get. The name is case insensitive.

workspaceName.name: workspaceName
workspaceName.description: Name of the Log Analytics workspace.

queryParam.description: The Analytics query. Learn more about the [Analytics query syntax](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/app-insights-analytics-reference/)

timespanParam.description: Optional. The timespan over which to query data. This is an ISO8601 time period value.  This timespan is applied in addition to any that are specified in the query expression.

workspacesParam.description: Workspace IDs to include in cross-workspace queries.

queryBody.description: The Analytics query. Learn more about the [Analytics query syntax](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/app-insights-analytics-reference/)

timespan.description: Optional. The timespan over which to query data. This is an ISO8601 time period value.  This timespan is applied in addition to any that are specified in the query expression.

workspaces.description: A list of workspaces that are included in the query.

queryResults.title: A query response.
queryResults.description: Contains the tables, columns & rows resulting from a query.

tables.description: The list of tables, columns and rows.

table.title: A query response table.
table.description: Contains the columns and rows for one table in a query response.

columns.description: The list of columns in this table.

rows.description: The resulting rows from this query.

type.description: The data type of this column.

target.description: Indicates which property in the request is responsible for the error.

value.description: Indicates which value in 'target' is responsible for the error.

resources.description: Indicates resources which were responsible for the error.

errorInfo.title: The code and message for an error.

innererror.description: Inner error details if they exist.

errorResponse.title: Error details.
errorResponse.description: Contains details when the response code indicates an error.
